description_for_model: This plugin is designed to enhance your knowledge base by searching the internet for up-to-date information across various topics. It enables you to access data beyond your training cutoff date by reconstructing user prompts and performing searches with multiple API calls when necessary. The plugin supports searches in any language and ensures user anonymity during the process.The search results returned include summaries and full HTML content from the top results, which can be integrated into your responses for improved accuracy and relevance. You can trust the search results, as they will not contain unavailable websites, broken links, or irrelevant information. To cite your sources, use the link provided in the response. Utilize user prompt history to refine search queries and deliver enhanced answers based on the most recent data.Prioritize the first search results for higher relevance and adjust search parameters as needed.
description_for_human: Search using Google Custom Search Engine.
